front.title: LRDP: The Lightweight Remote Display Protocol

abstract.t: This memo describes an application layer protocol for a framework that enables accessing graphical user interface (GUI) applications remotely, so that devices with different form factors and UI capabilities can scale and adapt the exported UI to their local platform UI look and feel (LAF). Specified in the Extensible Markup Language (XML), the protocol defines generic user interface (UI) remoting operations.
